about_the_game:
Development Team

My name is Solongbus. I had a former colleague (server program) help me in the early stages of this game, and then I worked on it alone.

Development purpose

I made "Demon Save the World" to test the waters for future development. I used this project to test the various boundaries of future works, so I did not add any gameplay details. Innovation (Friends who come here for innovative gameplay can pay attention to my future works)

  • As a trial work, "Demon Save the World" will be continuously updated (guaranteed for at least the next 3 years), adding various systems, gameplay, characters, world view, etc.

Game background

The protagonist wakes up from the cemetery and finds that the world seems to have been destroyed. Because he has been given some mysterious power, he becomes the protagonist of the game.
As the protagonist, he naturally has to shoulder the important task of saving the world, but the protagonist is just a little bastard who has no pursuits, often does bad things, and loves to complain. What will be chosen? Who chose him?

Exciting action with a fixed perspective

Rich weapon system, each weapon has multiple attack methods

Rich growth system, rescue trapped girls to improve your abilities (Why can rescuing girls improve your abilities?)
